revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Orange Pi |model=OPI Lite |revision=(512MB) |asin=B01G7IHN3K;GB; |price=12 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Shenzhen Xunlong |est_release_date=05/2016 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=4.0 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.7 |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=H3 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646F-BYNA |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8189FTV |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |flags=MicroSD Card slot, HDMI out, IR receiver, camera in, microphone, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_user=root |default_pass=orangepi }} {{TagLine|Open-source Single-board Computer}} :[http://www.orangepi.org/orangepilite/ Product page]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 @1.2GHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A7) <!--(H.265/HEVC 4K)--> *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' @600MHz (supports OpenGL ES 2.0) *Memory: 512MB/1GB (DDR3) SDRAM (shared with GPU) *Onboard Storage: TF card (max. 32GB) / MMC card slot *USB: 2x USB 2.0 (Host), 1x USB 2.0 (Micro, OTG) ports
{{WikiDevi.Wi-Cat.RU:Network/Orange Pi models}}
